title: Are cryptocurrency and stablecoins reliable investments? - Quora

response.answer_text: Due to the volatility, it can seem like cryptocurrencies are not a reliable way to invest. But it is quite possible to adapt to this. So yes, this is a good way to invest. Moreover, stablecoins are not as volatile as other coins. Their price is pegged to real currencies such as the dollar or euro. You won't capitalize on price changes, but you can take advantage of the ecosystem. A good example is the geckoin platform. You can invest in their stablecoin eurg and receive passive income.

Stable-coins are designed to maintain a stable market price without significant price changes. By being pegged to real-world assets like gold or the US dollar, stable coins avoid the wild price swings common in the cryptocurrency markets. They are now a viable option for people who choose to sit on the sidelines until the conditions of the market show a clear indication of an upcoming upward trend.
